products.title: Zucchini & Broccoli
products.description: Broccoli is packed with vitamins C and K, supporting healthy immune function and strong bones, while zucchini provides hydration and essential nutrients like potassium. Together, they create a tasty puree that introduces little ones to vibrant flavours and vital nutrients.

products.title: Butternut Squash, Apple & Cinnamon
products.description: This nutrient-dense blend features ingredients that are gentle and beneficial for babies. Butternut squash is loaded with vitamin A supporting healthy vision and immune function, while apples provide fibre, promoting good digestion. A touch of cinnamon adds a mild, baby-friendly spice that can help boost metabolism and aid digestion.

products.title: Chickpea & Banana
products.description: This creamy blend combines protein-rich chickpeas and potassium-packed bananas. Chickpeas provide essential plant-based protein and fibre, supporting healthy digestion and muscle development in babies. Bananas offer potassium, which is important for heart health, and natural carbohydrates to fuel active little ones.
